user-pop-newuser-connect-start-desc2: If you want to set the expiration date on the first connection, enter the number of validity days in the field above
user-pop-newuser-date-desc2: Leave this field empty if you set the expiration date automatically
user-pop-bulkuser-count-desc: Enter the number of user builds
user-pop-bulkuser-name-desc: Enter the initial phrase of the username
user-pop-bulkuser-start-desc: This number is placed after the beginning of the username
user-pop-bulkuser-password-desc: If you want the password to be lang, leave the above field blank
user-pop-bulkuser-chars-desc: Enter the number of characters of the password
user-pop-bulkuser-connect-desc: Enter the number of simultaneous users
user-pop-bulkuser-date-desc2: If you want to set the expiration date on the first connection, enter the number of validity days in the field above
user-pop-bulkuser-alert: Note that if the user is already registered, the system will not allow the registration
setting-general-base: Enter the basis for calculating traffic (in some data centers, traffic calculation varies depending on the data center network)
setting-general-direct: Change the login path to the panel
setting-status-log: Displaying the connection traffic log within the application.
setting-backup-bot_title: Creating Backup and List of Users with Expiry Date 2 Days or Less in Telegram Bot (Every 12 Hours)
setting-backup-bot_error_ssl: Please enable SSL first, then reconfigure.
setting-blockip-desc1: To block Iranian IP addresses (ports 80 and 443), execute the following command in the terminal:
setting-fake-desc: Attention, by activating the fake address, it will be deleted if you have installed WordPress
setting-wordpress-desc1: Attention, the fake address will be deleted after installing WordPress
setting-wordpress-desc2: After installing WordPress, when your domain address is entered in the browser without the login panel port, the WordPress website you installed will be loaded
setting-wordpress-desc3: To install WordPress, first create the database through the command below, then install WordPress with the database specifications
setting-wordpress-desc4: The Database Name step will be the name of your WordPress database
setting-wordpress-desc5: The Database Username step will be your WordPress database username
setting-wordpress-desc6: Password User step will be your WordPress database password
setting-wordpress-desc7: In the Enter password step, you must enter the root password of the server to create the database
setting-wordpress-desc8: After completing the above steps, start installing WordPress. To install, just enter the link below and proceed with the installation steps
settings-port-ssh: By changing the connection port, the server will reboot once.
settings-port-ssh-tls: By changing the TLS connection port, the server will reboot once.
settings-port-alert-success: The port has been successfully changed, and the server has been restarted.
settings-custom-user: Remove unauthorized users <small>(users added manually from the terminal)</small>
settings-xguard-email: Enter your real and personal email
settings-xguard-desc: The entered information must be accurate. Please note that if the entered information is incorrect and a payment is made from your side, it will not be traceable.
settings-xguard-desc2: Note that the server can still connect even if it is filtered, so do not change the IP of your server because it is not possible to change in the anti-filter system.
settings-xguard-desc3: By obtaining the anti-filter, the connection address and connection port will change. First, make sure to obtain the anti-filter, and then proceed to obtain it.
settings-xguard-domain:
Anti-Filter is active, please follow the steps below
Create a Cname record in Cloudflare and connect it to your personal anti-filter address.
Make sure the proxy or orange cdn cloud is off.
After completing the mentioned steps, set your domain in the corresponding field.
settings-xguard-capacity: The capacity of the anti-filter server is full
premium-desc1: By purchasing a 6-month license subscription, you will have access to features suitable for commercial use.
premium-desc2-1: IP rotation can improve the connection quality of the subscription. This system can automatically change your IP every hour or calculate the total server traffic. It also changes the IP automatically if the IP is filtered.
premium-desc2-2: You need to obtain additional IPs from your hosting service provider, and make sure the IPs are valid.
premium-desc2-3: What is the difference between IP rotation and anti-filter? The anti-filter system is not suitable for high-connection scenarios. Users with high connections (high online users) are advised to use IP rotation.
premium-desc3-1: In X Panel, an infinite number of servers are used to establish connections. This feature will be added soon.
premium-desc4-1: An exclusive link is created for each user to view their subscription credit and usage volume. This feature will be added soon.
premium-desc5-1: Notification of subscription status to the user by sending an email.
ip-adapter-change-hourly-desc: The connection IP subdomain will automatically change every hour.
ip-adapter-change-traffic-desc: Based on the gigabytes of traffic change towards the server, the IP subdomain will be changed.
ip-adapter-change-filtering-desc: Every 15 minutes, the connection IP is checked, and if it is filtered, the IP subdomain is changed automatically.
ip-adapter-change-ip-desc: First, set up the Cloudflare connection in the above form. If the connection is successful, proceed to add the IP.
ip-adapter-change-ip-desc2: Enter the IPs currently connected to the server in the list below. Besides the main IP, you can also obtain additional IPs from your hosting service provider.
ip-adapter-change-ip-desc3: Note that in IP rotation, hourly and traffic-based IPs that are filtered are not automatically detected. You need to manually delete or change the IP to the filtered state.
ip-adapter-change-ip-desc4: In hourly IP rotation, your IP may be mistakenly placed in the filtered state due to high traffic to the server. Make sure to check IPs that change status to filtered.
ip-adapter-change-popup-ip-add: IP Address added to the list
allert-submit: Are you sure you want to proceed with the operation?
mail-account-detail-limit-day: Less than %s days left until the service expires
license-text-2: Set up the license in the license section of the settings.
setting-crontab-desc: The active cronjobs on your server are displayed below. Check if the address is different and use the Fix Cronjob option if necessary.
